name: The 3rd Symposium on World Cell and Molecular Biology
content: The organizing committee sincerely welcome you to join in the 3rd Symposium on World Cell and Molecular Biology (SWCMB 2025), which will be held during Mar. 24th-26th, 2025 in Kyoto, Japan. SWCMB 2025 includes 15 breakout streams, as well as poster exhibition in the three-day scientific program. The topics will focus on Genetics & Genomics, DNA & RNA Research, Epigenetics & Chromatin, Biochemistry Research, Protein, Peptide and Proteomics, etc. SWCMB 2025 is planned as a hybrid event. We are hopeful that many of you will be able to make the trip to the beautiful country to see old colleagues, and make new friends.
organizers: Life and Medical Sciences Innovation Institute(LMSII)
